*How can I make a XML backup?*

If you have server access, use this http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:DumpBackup.php

If you have no server access, then use our dump generator. If the wiki you want to backup has API, use this:
  * _python dumpgenerator.py --api=http://wikidomain.com/path/to/api.php --xml_

If API is not available, then use this:
  * _python dumpgenerator.py --index=http://wikidomain.com/path/to/index.php --xml_

*Can I resume a dump?*

Yes, you can. Use the parameter _--path_ to indicate where is the incomplete dump. The script will resume it.
  * _python dumpgenerator.py --api=http://wikidomain.com/path/to/api.php --xml --images --path=dumpdirectory_
